attributes.action: give official and regular Government funding to all County Air Ambulances. as they provide an integral and necessary service in saving lives and alleviating suffering quickly and professionally.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We strongly feel that air ambulances should be Government funded and not have to exist solely by fundraising.They provide a lifesaving service that saves so many lives by transporting victims quickly and safely to A and E hospitals.They are crewed by teams of dedicated volunteers and all their contributions should be officially recognised.At present, the wonderful contributions of these people are taken for granted by the Government.
